body:
The Company ended its last session at $40.15 by Surging 0.12%. The Average Volume Traded by the company in the last trading session is at 13.04 Million. Its 52-week High Value is $42 while its 52-week Low value is $34.47. The company has its outstanding Shares of 4.1 Billion. The Stock shows P/E value of 19.25 and Forward P/E of 14.36.

Market capitalization is the total market value of all of a company’s outstanding shares. Market capitalization is calculated by multiplying a company’s shares outstanding by the current market price of one share. The investment community uses this figure to determine a company’s size, as opposed to sales or total asset figures. Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) has the market capitalization of 164.71 Billion.

The (Simple Month Average) SMA20 is at 3.02 percent, its SMA50 Value is 2% and SMA200 value is reported as 1.47 Percent. The stock is currently showing its Return on Assets (ROA) value of 7.6 Percent. The Return on Equity (ROE) and Return on Investment values are 18.7 percent and 11.2 percent respectively.

Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) has its dividend (annual) of 0.6 while its Dividend Yield (annual) is 1.49%. A dividend is a distribution of a portion of a company’s earnings decided by its BOD (board of directors) specifically for its shareholders. Dividends are mostly given in terms of cash payments, property or as shares of stock.

If we look at the Volatility of the company, Week Volatility is 1.21%, whereas Month Volatility is at 1.15%. The ATR (Average True Range) value is 0.52.

Year to date (YTD) refers to the period beginning the first day of the current calendar or fiscal year up to the current date. YTD information is useful for analyzing business trends or comparing performance data, and the acronym often modifies concepts such as investment returns, earnings and net pay. Year to Date (YTD) performance of Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) is 4.83 percent while its Performance (Week) is 2.45 percent and Performance (month) is at 3.46 percent.

According to the analysts, Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) currently has a Mean Price Target of $43.5. The Low and High Price targets are $25 and $52, respectively. These price targets are a consensus analysis of 36 brokers.

In order to reach an opinion/Recommendation the analyst research public financial statements, listen in on conference calls and talk to managers and the customers of a company, in attempt to capture the information for a research report. Based on this investigation into the company’s performance the analyst decides whether their stock is a “buy,” sell” or hold.

By looking at the Recommendation Trends of the stock polled by Thomson First call for the current month, 8 Analysts assigned the stock as Strong Buy. 14 said it’s a Buy, 13 assigned Hold rating where 3 stated the stock as Underperform and 0 marked the stock as Sell.

While looking at the Earnings Estimates of the company, The Average Earnings Estimate for the Current Fiscal quarter is measured as $0.59 by 30 analysts. They are also projecting the Low EPS estimate as $0.55 as compared to the Higher EPS estimate of $0.63.

Now when we talk about Revenue Estimate for the current Fiscal Quarter, Average Revenue Estimate of the stock is projected as $9.25 Billion where Low Revenue estimate and High Revenue Estimates are $9.16 Billion and $9.39 Billion respectively by 31 analysts.
title: Stock to Lookout For: Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) | The Ripon Advance
